🚀 RAG Collector API

Interactive Testing Interface for Website Content Collection

Checking API status...

📋 API Endpoints

Health Check

GET /api/health

Check if the API server is running and healthy. No authentication required.

Configuration

The base URL of your API server

                        

                    

                


                
                

                    

                        
Start Website Scan

                        

                            POST
                            /api/scan
                        

                        

                            Initiate a comprehensive website crawl and content extraction. Returns a scan ID for tracking progress.
                        

                    


                    

                        
Configuration

                        

                            
                            
                            
Required for authentication

                        

                        
                        

                            
                            
                            

                                balolabs.com
                                example.com
                                docs.github.com
                                nodejs.org
                                reactjs.org

Check Scan Status

                        

                            GET
                            /api/scan/{scanId}/status
                        

                        

                            Monitor the progress of a running scan. Returns current status, progress percentage, and pages scanned.
                        

                    


                    

                        
Configuration

                        

                            
                            
                        

                        

                            
                            
                            
Get this from the Start Scan response

                        

                        
                        

                            
                        


                        
                    


                    

                        

                            
0%

                        

                        

                            

                                
0

                                
Pages Scanned

                            

                            

                                
-

                                
Status

                            

                            

                                
0s

                                
Elapsed Time

                            

                        

                    


                    

                        

                            

                            

                        

                        

                            

                        

                    

                


                
                

                    

                        
Get Scan Results

                        

                            GET
                            /api/scan/{scanId}/results
                        

                        

                            Retrieve the complete results of a finished scan including all pages, statistics, and site structure.
                        

                    


                    

                        
Configuration

                        

                            
                            
                        

                        

                            
                            
                        


                        
                    


                    

                        

                            
                            
                            
                        

                        
                        

                            

                        

                        
                        

                            

                        

                        
                        

                            

                                

                            

                        

                    

                


                
                

                    

                        
Extract Single Page

                        

                            POST
                            /api/extract
                        

                        

                            Extract content from a single URL without running a full scan. Perfect for testing individual pages.
                        

                    


                    

                        
Configuration

                        

                            
                            
                        

                        

                            
                            
                            

                                balolabs.com/about
                                example.com/faq
                                nodejs.org/docs
                            

                        

                        
                        

                            
                            

                                

                                    
                                    
                                

                                

                                    
                                    
                                

                                

                                    
                                    
                                

                            

                        


                        
                    


                    

                        

                            

                            

                        

                        

                            

                        

                    

                


                
                

                    

                        
Export Scan Data

                        

                            POST
                            /api/export
                        

                        

                            Export scan results in various formats for use in RAG systems or further analysis.
                        

                    


                    

                        
Configuration

                        

                            
                            
                        

                        

                            
                            
                        

                        

                            
                            
                        


                        
                    


                    

                        

                            

                            

                        

                        

                            

                        

                    

                


                
                

                    

                        
Batch Scan

                        

                            POST
                            /api/batch
                        

                        

                            Scan multiple websites simultaneously. Maximum 10 URLs per batch.
                        

                    


                    

                        
Configuration

                        

                            
                            
                        

                        

                            
                            
                            
Enter up to 10 URLs, one per line
